title: Sangria melon chiller
ingredients: ['50g caster sugar', '80ml water', '5g fresh mint leaves, torn', '8 sprigs fresh mint for garnish', '1 (750ml) bottle Sauvignon Blanc, chilled', '250ml fresh orange juice, chilled', '120ml Triple Sec or other orange-flavoured liqueur', '500g bite-size wedges of cantaloupe', '500g bite-size wedges of watermelon, seeds removed as much as possible']
